title: Graduate Internship in Quantitative Finance I
description:
In addition to having academic foundation, students with good soft skills and industrial experience often stand a better chance when seeking for jobs upon their graduation. This module gives postgraduate Science students the opportunity to acquire work experience via internship/s during their candidature.

The module requires students to perform a minimum of 20hours per week structured internship in an approved company/institution for stipulated minimum period of 6 weeks.
preclusion: QF5402 Graduate Internship in Quantitative Finance II
